title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: Improved urban basic services comprising sewerage and sanitation, solid waste management, and water supply in the cities of Balykchy, Cholpon-Ata, and Karakol

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

By end of Project (2015): (i) Population access to safe sanitation increased from 43,000 persons in 2010 to 68,000 persons (45,000 persons through sewerage system and 23,000 persons through onsite sanitation)

description.narrative: Improved urban basic services comprising sewerage and sanitation, solid waste management, and water supply in the cities of Balykchy, Cholpon-Ata, and Karakol

title.narrative: (ii) Municipal solid waste collection increased to cover 133,500 persons from 61,500 persons in 2010

description.narrative: Improved urban basic services comprising sewerage and sanitation, solid waste management, and water supply in the cities of Balykchy, Cholpon-Ata, and Karakol

title.narrative: (iii) Improved water supply ensured to already connected households

description.narrative: Improved urban basic services comprising sewerage and sanitation, solid waste management, and water supply in the cities of Balykchy, Cholpon-Ata, and Karakol
